content: +description this is a crochet pattern for the wren tank +tee an easy and versatile top that will pair perfectly with all your favorite outfits it is made up of simple extended single_crochet stitches and chain stitches creating a beautiful and modern texture this pattern includes instructions for sizes xsmall- 5xl +skill level this is a beginner level pattern +materials *approximately 600-1800 yards of size 3 light weight yarn depending on size *size i 5 5 mm crochet hook *stitch markers *yarn needle +more check out more of cactus and lace designs patterns here https //www etsy com/shop/cactusandlacedesigns if you have any questions or difficulties with this pattern at all please don t hesitate to message me i would love to help answer any of your questions +share your work don t forget to follow along on social media to receive updates and to share your work instagram @cactus and lace ravelry ravelry com/people/cactusandlacedesigns pinterest https //www pinterest com/cactusandlacedesigns/ please tag me @cactus and lace in your pictures of your finished items i would love to see and share them and don t forget to use the hashtag #cactusandlacedesigns +pattern copyright please do not copy redistribute or sell my pattern in any way i hope you enjoy your finished wren tank + tee if you choose to sell the finished product please credit me ashley cobb of cactus & lace designs and provide a link to www etsy com/shop/cactusandlacedesigns in your listings so that other makers can find me as well thank you for understanding
